Where Can I Get Evolt Org Images

20 May 2001

Here are some logos and banners that you can download and use on your web site to link back to evolt.org. Please don't link directly to the image; instead, download a copy and store it on your own server. You just never know when things will get moved around here and we all hate to have broken links.

If you want to create and submit an evolt.org banner, feel free to email it here. You'll get fame, fortune, and gratitude! :)

Logos:

   \n
Transparent, non-animated versions of the logo.

\n

   \n
Animated versions of the logo.

\n
\nAliased version of the logo intended for use on any ol' background.\n
